name: Spacebar (mewmewdevart)
description:
Hire Employees to run your SpaceBar!

Move the manager around with WASD or ↑ ← ↓  →
Motivate your employees with 'R'!

Spacebar  was made for the Ready Player 42 within five days, with the theme "Addictive Game". 
Have you ever wanted to run your very own space canteen? Yell at.. *cough*, encourage you workers to work more efficiently? Today's your lucky day!
With Spacebar you can do all of those things, today!
Manage your canteen through increasingly difficult situations. your success is in your hands!


If you support the game for as little as you like you can get a version of the game with this beautiful cash registry! Now that is something I wouldn't want to miss!
